rows.label: qev097702_MSG0001
rows.name:
Just got your report confirming the Lifehold unit's
coordinates. Nice work![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Access code? Er, what access code?
I haven't heard anything about an access code.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0003
rows.name:
Hmm, I'll double-check on my end, buuut...
Look, are you sure you're doing it right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'm just working off the data I have, but there's never
been any mention of access codes before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0005
rows.name:
They were never designed to be scattered around like
this, so it just doesn't make sense to put any fancy
security in place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0006
rows.name:
Yeah, I don't know. Normally I love surprises,
but I'm not a fan of this one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0007
rows.name:
Well, I'll look into it. Meanwhile, you keep investigating
the site and ring me up if you find anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0008
rows.name: I'll give you a buzz if I find anything here. Toodles![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0009
rows.name: You crack that code yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0010
rows.name:
It is a simple trap if you ask me, but you humans lose
any sense of caution when it comes to these pieces of
that Lifehold of yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0011
rows.name:
The program asking you for a code isn't connected to
a lock at allâ€”it just sends a signal when someone
touches it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0012
rows.name: That signal comes to us...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0013
rows.name:
And then we can secure the high ground around you
before you are even aware of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0014
rows.name:
That device is of no real use to us, but not destroying
it has certainly paid off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0015
rows.name: It's the perfect snare for idiots like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0016
rows.name:
And now that I've shared the trick behind our little
setup here, we can move on to the fun part.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0017
rows.name: ...Where we kill you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0018
rows.name: You've got to be kidding me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0019
rows.name: There's no fun in an ambush if your prey fights back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0020
rows.name:
Rrrgh! And this is probably all the backup we can
hope to get.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097702_MSG0021
rows.name: All right, men! Fight! Leave no one alive![ST:wait ]
